font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 v. 不断烦扰，骚扰： to disturb or distress by or as if by repeated attacks; harass
【反】 comfort, mollify 安慰

【记】 看成harrass；hare + y兔子般的，总受骚扰
